parameters: \N<\n[1]>「He still seems to be lying down... what should we do？」
I heard that a man who seems to be an adventurer is lying down.
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm... no external injuries... I'll help if it seems dangerous.」
対象：冒険者　呪いを解くには射精が必要らしい
対象：村人　足以外でイく事が出来ない体になってしまった。
\N<Adventurer>「The royal capital has become safer lately,
So It’s about time I head to another land for work…」
\N<\n[1]>「Don’t you take jobs other than subjugation？」
\N<Adventurer>「That's true, but I can't do anything other than fight…。」
\N<Adventurer>「If you were to take on requests other than combat,
What kind of requests would you take？」
\N<Adventurer>「Could you tell me, just for reference？」
Requests that make you feel energized would be nice！
Requests that make use of my charm…… perhaps.
Taking care of children, walking dogs…… stuff like that？？
Requests that make you feel energized would be nice！
\N<冒険者>「Feel energized？？ What kind of requests are those？？」
\N<\n[1]>「You asked me what kind of requests I’d like, so I answered.」
\N<冒険者>「……Yeah, I guess the way I asked was bad.」
\N<冒険者>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
Requests that make use of my charm…… perhaps.
\N<冒険者>「Charm？ What kind of requests are those？」
\N<\n[1]>「Like being a shop assistant？ Or maybe a clothing model would be nice！」
\N<Adventurer>"I don’t think there are such requests…？」
\N<Adventurer>"Because this is an adventurer’s guild, right？ If there were requests, they’d come from the merchant guild, wouldn’t they？」
\N<\n[1]>「But with my charm, it wouldn’t be strange if I got an offer, right？」
\N<冒険者>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
Taking care of children, walking dogs…… stuff like that？？
\N<\n[1]>「That’s right, domestic or safe jobs？ Those are good.」
\N<Adventurer>"Then, if a request comes in asking you to cook, why not take it？」
\N<\n[1]>「Would such a request come to the adventurer’s guild？？」
\N<\n[1]>「But once, an acquaintance who ate my cooking threw it at me….」
\N<\n[1]>「According to my acquaintance, they said there was a poisonous plant in it.」
\N<\n[1]>「I thought it would be a good accent to the flavor…… it was a bit spicy.」
\N<Adventurer>「It seems like there’s something you need to learn before cooking.」
\N<Adventurer>「I think that’s something you shouldn’t be saying…….」
\N<冒険者>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
\N<Adventurer>「It’s good that it’s safe…… but for me,
It’s a matter of life and death…….」
対象：冒険者相手に口で奉仕する仕事
口淫回数が一定以上で発生
\N<\n[1]>「Huh？ You’re someone I haven’t seen before.」
\N<Adventurer>「Well, I think I look more like an adventurer than you do.」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm, indeed... you do look a bit strong.」
\N<Adventurer>「What’s with you... looking for a fight？」
\N<Adventurer>「You’re a hard one to figure out...」
\N<Adventurer>「If you’re an adventurer... then it’s Bog’s request, right?」
\N<Adventurer>「Come on, there’s no one in this village who doesn’t know him.」
\N<\n[1]>「Wow... so that’s why you’re so muscular.」
\N<Adventurer>「Though usually, it’s just me and some low-rank adventurers who come here occasionally...」
\N<冒険者>「If you say Bronze, that's the same as me……」
\N<冒険者>「So why are you talking like you’re stronger than me？」
\N<\n[1]>「Isn’t that the case？ I’m strong, you know？？」
\N<冒険者>「Sigh…… Bog said he sent a request to the royal capital, didn’t he……」
\N<冒険者>「Are there only guys like this in the royal capital……?」
\N<冒険者>「So？ Did you manage to get inside that tower？」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, there was some kind of magical barrier？ I removed it.」
\N<冒険者>「Heeh… so you’re not just all talk, you’ve got skills too.」
\N<冒険者>「So that means I can go in too……」
\N<\n[1]>「You can, but please don’t get in the way of my investigation, okay？」
\N<冒険者>「Ah, now that you mention it, you sent the request for the investigation, didn’t you?」
\N<Adventurer> "Then I’ll quietly go around the village and thin out the monsters...」
\N<\n[1]>「It would be a great help if you could do that.」
\N<Adventurer> "By the way, can I ask you something？」
\N<Adventurer> "I've been staying in this village for quite a while now,」
\N<Adventurer>"Well... how should I put it... I don't have much luck with women...」
\N<\n[1]>「To begin with, there aren't many young women in this village.」
\N<Adventurer>"Yeah, that's part of it... but maybe I'm just not popular？」
\N<\n[1]>「Being popular, does it mean whether women will have feelings for you or not, am I correct？」
\N<Adventurer>"No mistake about it... but you really are a troublesome woman.」
\N<\n[1]>「Let's just let that slip of the tongue slide.」
\N<Adventurer>「Then let me change the question, what kind of guy is popular？」
\N<Adventurer>「You’re a woman too, so you must have at least some interest in romance, right？」
\N<Adventurer>「It’s fine if it’s just your subjective opinion, so can you tell me？」
Maybe it’s about compatibility at night after all
Someone who is considerate and kind
Someone with a smile as cute as a dog’s
Maybe it’s about compatibility at night after all
\N<Adventurer>「Compatibility at night……you say！？ City girls are pretty forward, huh……。」
\N<\n[1]>「Ah, that’s just my personal opinion, okay？ It’s not like I’m saying that I……」
\N<Adventurer>「You don’t have to hide that part, right? You’re the one who brought it up, are you embarrassed now?」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s not what I mean, it’s just that if you’re thinking about starting a family, I thought it might be an important factor.」
\N<Adventurer>「Alright, I’ll let it go at that.」
\N<Adventurer>「But more importantly, we’re talking about whether someone’s popular or not……and you bring up physical compatibility first……isn’t that a bit complicated？」
\N<Adventurer>「If you have charm, people will come after you……right？」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, in the end, I guess that’s what being popular is all about, huh, ahaha！」
\N<冒険者>「This ain’t a laughing matter！ I’m being serious here, you know……」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, to be honest, the first thing is to find someone you like.」
\N<\n[1]>「Then, think about how to get that person to notice you and act on it.」
\N<\n[1]>「If you have enough charm, that person might turn to you.」
\N<\n[1]>「Depending on how you look at it, it’s kind of like hunting, I think.」
\N<冒険者>「I see……so, in a sense, a love adventurer……is that it?」
\N<冒険者>「Sigh……I was an idiot for consulting with you, someone I just met……」
\N<冒険者>「Huh？ What’s with the sudden change！？」
\N<\n[1]>「So I recommend you to have a little more confidence in yourself.」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, I think I've talked a bit too much, so I'll be going now.」
\N<Adventurer>"Ah, sorry for taking up your time, good luck with the investigation.」
\N<\n[1]>「And you, the adventurer of love... right♪」
Someone who is considerate and kind
\N<Adventurer>"Sigh... I guess women really do like that kind of thing, huh？」
\N<\n[1]>「That's right, I don't want to engage in unnecessary conflicts,」
\N<\n[1]>「and if violence were to be used, I'd lose due to the difference in strength.」
\N<Adventurer>"I see, so... a muscular guy like me must seem intimidating, huh?」
\N<\n[1]>「That's a rather self-deprecating way of thinking.」
\N<\n[1]>「...Could that be why you're not popular？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Consideration and kindness have nothing to do with muscles.」
\N<\n[1]>「Why do you connect that and look for another reason for not being popular？」
\N<冒険者>「Ugh... You’re really digging into my soul...」
\N<\n[1]>「In other words, the answer is clear, it was simple.」
\N<\n[1]>「Straight to the point！ The reason you’re not popular is because you lack confidence in yourself！」
\N<\n[1]>「I don’t know about you as an adventurer, but when it comes to women, you...」
\N<\n[1]>「At best, you’re like a Horn Rabbit... a cute little horned rabbit.」
\N<\n[1]>「So I recommend you to have a little more confidence in yourself.」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, I think I've talked a bit too much, so I'll be going now.」
\N<Adventurer>"Ah, sorry for taking up your time, good luck with the investigation.」
\N<\n[1]>「Next time we meet, please gain enough confidence to graduate from being a horned rabbit.」
Someone with a smile as cute as a dog’s
\N<冒険者>「A smile？？ Do you really think that’ll make you popular？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Oh？ It’s an important thing, you know？」
\N<冒険者>「Is that so... I thought looking dignified would make you more popular...」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s because you’re misunderstanding what it means to be 「popular.」」
\N<Adventurer>"Why is that！? Then what does it mean！?」
\N<\n[1]>「People you enjoy being with and people you just admire are different... that's what it means.」
\N<\n[1]>「People you just admire... like models or high-ranking adventurers...」
\N<\n[1]>「In other words, an object of admiration！ This is the basis of what you call being popular.」
\N<\n[1]>「But have you ever seen the image of a couple who actually have a family and live happily？」
\N<\n[1]>「Not everyone is living all dressed up and pretty, right?」
\N<\n[1]>「Then, how did you become attracted to each other？ It's simple.」
\N<Adventurer> "No way... just a smile... that's all...」
\N<\n[1]>「Of course, accompanying that, the person's character and daily behavior will also be taken into consideration.」
\N<\n[1]>「However, the deciding factor is……\! You already know, right？」
\N<Adventurer>「I see……it’s cool……but it’s not just about being cool……！？」
\N<\n[1]>「Ufufu, if you’ve realized that, then you’ll be fine.」
\N<\n[1]>「All that’s left is to have confidence！」
\N<\n[1]>「……I’ve talked a bit too much, I’ll be going now.」
\N<Adventurer>"Ah, sorry for taking up your time, good luck with the investigation.」
\N<\n[1]>「Adventurer with a wonderful smile, I think you’ll be popular.」
\N<Adventurer>「Having confidence in myself……huh.\! I’m still such a rookie for not even noticing something like this.」
\N<村人>「Right？ I take care of them diligently every day.」
\N<村人>「If you were to eat root vegetables, what cooking method would you prefer?」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm？ Well… when it comes to root vegetables…」
I don’t eat root vegetables because they make you gain weight.」
\N<村人>「Ahh… that’s nice！ The flavor soaks in and it’s delicious, right?」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, it somehow has a homely taste that I really like♪」
\N<村人>「If you get the chance, try cooking with our vegetables！」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, I’ll enjoy them deliciously when that time comes！」
\N<村人>「Huh？ You’re just going to bite into them？！」
\N<\n[1]>「I think the natural taste of the ingredients is the best.」
\N<\n[1]>「Besides, does the level of satisfaction really change that much just because of added flavor？」
\N<村人>「I think it does change though…」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm, I’ve never been that conscious about food before.」
\N<\n[1]>「I’ll try to be a bit more mindful from now on.」
\N<村人>「I think that’s a good idea.」
\N<村人>「If you’re going to eat, you might as well enjoy it, and I’d want others to enjoy it too.」
I don’t eat root vegetables because they make you gain weight.」
\N<村人>「Sigh… Women from the city sure are conscious about these things, huh…」
\N<\n[1]>「It’s not exactly like that, but who wouldn’t want to be a beautiful woman?」
\N<\n[1]>「It’s not that I dislike them, but I gained weight once from eating root vegetables before,」
\N<\n[1]>「so since then, I’ve been avoiding eating them actively.」
\N<村人>「Well, if it’s delicious, you’ll end up eating a lot.」
\N<村人>「Appearance is important, but make sure to eat properly too.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, I understand the hardship of not having food！」
\N<村人>「It makes me happy to see the villagers enjoy the vegetables I’ve grown.」
\N<Villager>「Are you the adventurer who recently came to the village？」
\N<Villager>「You… you’re young and beautiful for an adventurer.」
\N<Villager>「Yeah, I feel an aura that you don’t usually find in women from the countryside.」
\N<\n[1]>「Sniff sniff, do I really smell nice？？」
\N<Villager>「By the way, what do you think of a guy like me？」
\N<Villager>「You know, as a man… that’s what I mean.」
「You seem like you don’t like vegetables.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes. I thought you were very cheerful and easygoing.」
\N<Villager>「Hmm… that’s not exactly what I meant though.」
\N<Villager>「Well, but I don’t feel bad about it, it’s totally fine！」
\N<Villager>「Sorry for asking such a weird question！」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, please don’t worry about it.」
\N<村人>「Huh？ Huh！？ Does it seem that way？」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, I think you have a appearance that women would like.」
\N<村人>「I see…… so I really am cool…….」
\N<村人>「Huh？！ Well…… I’ve never been told that directly before.」
\N<村人>「Ah, thank you！ I’m glad I got to talk to you！！」
「You seem like you don’t like vegetables.」
\N<村人>「Huh？ Is that the impression I give？？」
\N<\n[1]>「On the contrary, you seem like someone who enjoys meat and alcohol…… am I right？？」
\N<\n[1]>「I’m glad……. I do have a good eye for these things！」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, if there’s anything else you’d like to ask, please ask me！」
\N<村人>「Hmm…… not right now, I guess…… our conversation isn’t really meshing.」
\N<\n[1]>「Bad alignment？ Is it a dental issue？？」
\N<Villager>"No, no, it's about me, so it's fine！ See, you're busy, right？？」
\N<Villager>"I’ll leave this remote village someday and head to the royal capital.」
\N<Villager>「Sigh……I’ve only been away from the village for a few days, but when did so many outsiders come……」
\N<\n[1]>「Even if you say that, I came here on a request.」
\N<Villager>「A request？……Well, if it’s something the village chief and Bog-san decided, I won’t complain.」
\N<Villager>「First you, and then there’s that younger girl who said she’s an adventurer……is that really true？」
\N<\n[1]>「No, because when I first met her, she had already completed the registration.」
\N<Villager>「Even so, couldn’t you have made her quit？」
\N<Villager>「For a child like that… being an adventurer is far too dangerous.」
\N<\n[1]>「It’s impossible. Only she can decide that.」
\N<\n[1]>「Besides, I’m keeping an eye on her as her senior.」
\N<Villager>「What exactly is an adventurer to you people…？」
\N<Villager>「How can you waste your lives like that…？」
\N<\n[1]>「For us… no, for me, an adventurer is…,」
A free profession bound by no one
A profession full of encounters with various people
A profession necessary to achieve one’s goals
A free profession bound by no one
\N<\n[1]>「Going to places I like, eating the food I like, sleeping when I want to.」
\N<\n[1]>「To make that happen, I need money, so I’m taking risks for the sake of freedom？」
\N<Villager>「If you work in a safe place, you can live without taking risks, right？」
\N<\n[1]>「That may be true, but it's impossible for me.」
\N<Villager>「Impossible? Why can you say that so definitively?」
\N<\n[1]>「Because I have a purpose for my journey.」
\N<\n[1]>「Only adventurers can be flexible with place, land, and time.」
\N<Villager>「I see… So you have a purpose worth betting your life on.」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, if it’s a sure win…\! Let’s do it.」
\N<\n[1]>「I’d like to hear a good deal just once, you know.」
\N<Villager>「If such a thing existed, I’d have done it first.」
\N<\n[1]>「So, please don’t stop the two of them and support them instead.」
\N<\n[1]>「Only they themselves can stop their own progress.」
\N<Villager>「Adventurers are a bunch of people I just can’t understand.」
\N<Villager>「It’s not an insult, I’m just a little envious… maybe jealous.」
\N<\n[1]>「Then why don’t you become an adventurer too？」
\N<Villager>「At this age？ My body doesn’t even move properly anymore, you know？？」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, obstacles are just part of the journey towards your goal！」
\N<Villager>「That’s exactly why it’s impossible for me…」
\N<Villager>「That’s what I feel like I’m being told.」
\N<\n[1]>「Huh？ I don’t understand what you mean？」
\N<Villager>「Me neither, so I’m not planning to say anything more about adventurers.」
\N<\n[1]>「Being an understanding, good neighbor is the best help you can give.」
A profession full of encounters with various people
\N<Villager>「Meeting someone？ Are you looking for a man too？？」
\N<\n[1]>「That might be the case, but it’s not the goal.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, to be precise, you are one of them.」
\N<Villager>「Huh？ What the hell… you got my hopes up.」
\N<\n[1]>「The knowledge and experiences gained from meeting various people will surely enrich your life.」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s why I travel with that in mind.」
\N<Villager>「Then, am I also one of those various experiences…？」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s right, this conversation wouldn’t have been possible if I hadn’t come to this village.」
\N<Villager>「This kind of conversation, isn’t it just trivial stuff?」
\N<\n[1]>「But, I was able to experience a trivial conversation, right？」
\N<Villager>「Huh？ I don’t get what’s so important about that？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, well, I believe that understanding is a step towards meeting the other person halfway.」
\N<\n[1]>「I'm just happy that you're curious about it.」
\N<Villager>"Hmm... it's hard to understand what adventurers are thinking.」
\N<\n[1]>「That might be true, that's why all adventurers act with thought.」
\N<\n[1]>「So, don’t you think it’s wrong to interfere with their decision to become adventurers just because they’re young?」
\N<\n[1]>「Don’t you think it’s inappropriate to meddle？」
\N<村人>「You’re saying both of them have their own reasons, right？」
\N<村人>「I get it, in my head… but when I see them, I can’t help but think it’s dangerous.」
\N<\n[1]>「Then, all the more reason to support them from now on.」
\N<\n[1]>「I think they’d feel more reassured being watched over rather than being worried about.」
\N<村人>「Sorry for saying all that… my bad.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, it’s fine as long as you understand.」
A profession necessary to achieve one’s goals
\N<\n[1]>「I can’t go into details, but it’s a purpose that requires traveling the world.」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s why adventurers who can take jobs anywhere are ideal.」
\N<村人>「Haa… You might be like that, but those two kids…」
\N<\n[1]>「I don't think we... no, I don't think anyone has the right to stop the two of them from moving forward.」
\N<\n[1]>「I believe they are aware that they might die...」
\N<\n[1]>「Please don't underestimate my juniors as children.」
\N<村人>「Ugh！... You don't have to get so angry... I was just worried...」
\N<\n[1]>「It's fine to worry, but I won't tolerate interference.」
\N<\n[1]>「Even if you mean no harm, if the two of them take it as discomfort,」
\N<\n[1]>「then it's nothing but a nuisance, so please remember that.」
\N<村人>「Ah, yeah... If a reliable senior like you is looking after them, it might be okay.」
\N<村人>「That's right... Telling someone to stop because their life is in danger...」
\N<村人>「Who do I think I am, huh? Sorry about that...」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, it’s fine as long as you understand.」
\N<\n[1]>「From now on, please support the two of them.」
\N<村人>「Maybe I'll try living without prejudice from now on... It seems difficult, though.」
\N<村人>「Hey hey？ Are you an adventurer？」
\N<村人>「Huh… For someone who calls themselves an adventurer, you seem kind of weak… or rather, unreliable.」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm... as a wizard, I don't have much physical strength.」
\N<Villager>"But I feel something like charm or grace.」
\N<Villager>"This place is the frontier... so it's really rural, right？」
\N<Villager>"I've always longed for the city since I was young！」
\N<Villager>"Ah~... I'd love to go to the royal capital even just once...」
\N<\n[1]>「You can go to the royal capital by carriage, right？」
\N<Villager>"You can, but it's expensive, isn't it？」
\N<\n[1]>「If you're worried about travel expenses, how about walking there？」
\N<Villager>"No no, I wouldn't even think of walking there, you know？」
\N<Villager>"That's not saving anymore, that's just abnormal, abnormal.」
\N<Villager>"That's right！ More importantly, you！ Have you ever been to the royal capital？？」
\N<\n[1]>「It's not like I've been there... I came from the royal capital.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, I just use it as a base for adventurers……」
\N<Villager>「What’s popular in the royal capital right now？！？」
\N<Villager>「Yeah！ Out here in the frontier, we can’t hear about that kind of stuff from anyone……」
\N<Villager>「If you know, could you tell me？」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, um…… when it comes to what’s popular in the royal capital……」
\N<\n[1]>「To put it simply, independent prostitutes? I guess.」
\N<\n[1]>「The fee is negotiated with the man who approaches them…… something like that.」
\N<Villager>「Huh！？ Wait…… could it be…… you too……？」
\N<Villager>「But…… if you’re ever in a pinch for money, you’d try it…… right？」
\N<Villager>「………I’m sorry, I got worried about you……」
\N<Villager>「Y-yeah…… Keep up the good work as an adventurer……」
\N<\n[1]>「It seems interesting with the increasing variety of operas.」
\N<Villager>「Love operas…… Stories of love between different social classes？！」
\N<\n[1]>「Umm…… I think there were some works with that theme.」
\N<\n[1]>「There were so many varieties, so I don’t remember all of them.」
\N<Villager>「Ahhh…… Even dreams that could never come true in real life are fulfilled on stage……」
\N<\n[1]>「The response has been huge, and the area around the theater has been bustling with people every day.」
\N<Villager>「Alright！ I’ve decided！ I’ll save up money and go see an opera！」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, I think it’ll be a great experience.」
\N<Villager>「And then, I’ll meet a prince who came incognito to watch… and then…… and then！」
\N<村人>「Huh？ Oh my, I'm sorry, I tend to lose sight of my surroundings when I get excited.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, I think I’ll be going now.」
\N<村人>「Yeah, thanks for sharing such an interesting story！」
\N<村人>「Is that like the ones you’re wearing now？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, they can make your legs look pretty,」
\N<\n[1]>「and depending on the material, some can even provide warmth or protect against blades.」
\N<村人>「Huh…… but those things called knee socks……？」
\N<村人>「I mean, the shape of your legs is clearly visible, right？」
\N<村人>「If you gain weight…… you wouldn’t be able to wear them, right？」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, I think it’s fine to wear them？」
\N<\n[1]>「I don’t think you need to worry about what others think.」
\N<\n[1]>「Besides, there are now many different patterns of knee socks available,」
\N<\n[1]>「If you want to be fashionable, why not give it a try？」
\N<Villager>「You too, for the sake of fashion？」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, it seems white knee socks aren't popular, so they were sold in bulk at a discount.」
\N<Villager>「Well, it's true... black or purple might look more alluring.」
\N<Villager>「White might make you look a bit childish.」
\N<\n[1]>「I don't care about what others think, so I wear them because they're cheap.」
\N<Villager>「Hmm, but after talking to you, I think trying out various things isn't a bad idea！」
\N<Villager>「Until the day I go to the royal capital, I'll keep nurturing my aspirations！」
\N<\n[1]>「When you go to the royal capital, please enjoy it to the fullest！」
\N<Villager>「The royal capital of my dreams... I can't wait to see it in person.」
\N<Villager>「Huh？ A young woman in this village？？ That's rare.」
\N<Villager>「Wow... to be an adventurer at such a young age... that's amazing.」
\N<村人>「Oh, I'm sorry…… I spoke insensitively, didn't I…….」
\N<\n[1]>「I’m not bothered by it, so you don’t need to worry.」
\N<村人>「I’m relieved to hear you say that.」
\N<\n[1]>「More than that, I’m happy to have the chance to talk to someone around my age.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, especially since I’m always acting alone.」
\N<村人>「All alone！？ I always imagined adventurers would be traveling with companions…….」
\N<\n[1]>「There was a time when I thought about forming a party…… but being alone is easier.」
\N<村人>「But don’t you face a lot of hardships?」
\N<\n[1]>「No, surprisingly, I don’t have much trouble even alone.」
\N<\n[1]>「There’s no sharing of fun times, but on the flip side, there’s no bad atmosphere either！」
\N<村人>「That boldness of yours is enviable.」
\N<\n[1]>「Though sometimes I’m called carefree or naive.」
\N<村人>「Hehe, that’s fine, isn’t it? I like that more than someone who’s rigid.」
\N<Villager> "But if you're an adventurer working alone... you can't have a lover, right？」
\N<Villager> "Umm... I'd like to ask out of curiosity...」
\N<Villager> "What kind of man is your type？」
\N<Villager> "Yes, I don’t have anyone close to me to talk about this kind of thing… um….」
\N<Villager> "I’ve always been a bit envious of people who can talk about love… you know….」
\N<\n[1]>「Going hungry is the hardest thing, so someone with money is good.」
\N<\n[1]>「Well... if you've experienced a time of hunger with no food... it's self-explanatory.」
\N<Villager> "It seems you went through a really tough time...」
\N<\n[1]>「Thanks to that, I worked hard with the determination to never go through that experience again！」
\N<Villager>"Then a man with financial stability seems like he'd give a sense of security, doesn't he?」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, it's a bit of a boring answer, but... ahaha.」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, I should be heading off soon.」
\N<Villager>"Understood, it was nice talking to you！」
\N<\n[1]>「A man who wholeheartedly continues to think of me would be nice.」
\N<\n[1]>「Maybe it's because I usually dive into danger.」
\N<\n[1]>「Cheering me on while I work hard... isn't that nice？」
\N<\n[1]>「Ahaha, I'm not used to talking like this, so it's a bit embarrassing...」
\N<Villager>"But that's what's good about it！ I've always wanted to have conversations like this...」
\N<\n[1]>「If I could be of help, then that's the best thing.」
\N<\n[1]>「I’d like to talk a bit more, but it’s about time for me to head out.」
\N<Villager>"Understood, it was nice talking to you！」
\N<村人>「Indeed…… They’re more reliable than someone who’s all frail and weak.」
\N<\n[1]>「Since I’m not strong, it’s nice to have someone who can compensate for that, you know?」
\N<村人>「It’s like supporting each other, huh.」
\N<\n[1]>「And if we were to have kids…… I’d definitely want someone sturdy…….」
\N<村人>「Huh？ What？？ Your voice was too soft, I couldn’t catch that…」
\N<\n[1]>「Ah, no no. Just saying muscles are great.」
\N<村人>「I see, adventurers all seem to have great physiques, but is there anyone you’re interested in？」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm…… I haven’t really thought about it that way…… so I can’t say.」
\N<村人>「I see, but I hope you find someone someday！」
\N<\n[1]>「Ahaha, well, I’ll take my time looking.」
\N<\n[1]>「I’d like to talk a bit more, but it’s about time for me to head out.」
\N<Villager>"Understood, it was nice talking to you！」
\N<村人>「Ah…… I want to talk about love…… I want to talk about love all night until morning…….」
\N<Villager>「My my, welcome to such a remote village.」
\N<Villager>「Speaking of which, it feels like there are more people in the village than usual.」
\N<\n[1]>「I came here to investigate the western tower after receiving a request in the royal capital,」
\N<\n[1]>「and it seems there are a few adventurers who came here on similar requests.」
\N<Villager>「The western tower, you mean that shining tower？？」
\N<\n[1]>「I came here to confirm that while taking on the request……\! Did it really shine？？」
\N<Villager>「Yes, it shone brightly, like 'Pikaa！'…… It was really dazzling.」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm hmm, it seems there’s no mistake about it.」
\N<Villager>「Why did you come to see a shining tower？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, it’s because the thing I’m looking for might be here.」
\N<Villager>「Something you’re looking for？ In such a remote place？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Valuable…… you could say that.\! It’s something very important.」
\N<Villager>「My my, I hope you find it soon.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, I’ll do my best for that！」
\N<Villager>「But, that thing you’re looking for… just how important is it to you?」
\N<Villager>「You seem so passionate about it, it’s got me curious.」
A precious treasure that can’t be replaced by anything else
It’s more valuable than three meals a day with a nap！
It’s surely more important than a child I’ve given birth to in pain.
A precious treasure that can’t be replaced by anything else
\N<Villager>「Wow… it’s that important to you, huh?」
\N<Villager>「But it’s wonderful, the way you’re so focused on chasing something important, it’s like first love.」
\N<\n[1]>「First love… that’s a good way to put it… it might actually be spot on？」
\N<\n[1]>「In the sense that my heart has been stolen, it’s the same.」
\N<Villager>「Heeeh… I don’t know what that important thing is, but」
\N<Villager>「Absolutely find it and treasure it！ I’m rooting for you！」
It’s more valuable than three meals a day with a nap！
\N<\n[1]>「What are you talking about！？ You can live without working, you know！？」
\N<\n[1]>「This is already beyond human, isn’t it? Like, the realm of a god??」
\N<村人>「W-well……but if it’s just that……I might not be too envious.」
\N<\n[1]>「When you’re hungry, you can’t sleep, you know？」
\N<\n[1]>「On the other hand, when you’re full, you can sleep comfortably, you know？？」
\N<\n[1]>「Huff! Huff!\!……I got a little carried away.」
\N<村人>「What’s important varies from person to person, I’m sorry for making light of it.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, no, as long as you understand, that’s enough for me.」
\N<村人>「I don’t know what it is that you’re so passionate about,」
\N<村人>「but make sure to find it, I’ll be rooting for you.」
It’s surely more important than a child I’ve given birth to in pain.
\N<Villager>「Are you prioritizing it over your own child！？」
\N<\n[1]>「If I think of it as the meaning of life, then yes, it’s my life.」
\N<Villager>「I’m a little surprised……but also a bit envious.」
\N<Villager>「To have something you want to obtain with your entire being……」
\N<Villager>「You, who have such a life goal.」
\N<\n[1]>「Is that so？ It’s also a lot of stress, you know？？」
\N<Villager>「But that’s all part of life, right？」
\N<Villager>「Thank you for the wonderful story.\! I’ll also try to live each day with more thought.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, I didn’t do anything……\! But if it was of any help, then I’m glad!」
\N<Villager>「Sorry for keeping you with idle chatter.」
\N<Villager>「I’m rooting for you to find what’s important to you！」
\N<Villager>「People who shine brightly are dazzling and a little scary... but I admire them.」
\N<Adventurer>「The royal capital has become safer lately,
So It’s about time I head to another land for work…」
\N<\n[1]>「Don’t you take jobs other than subjugation？」
\N<Adventurer>「That's true, but I can't do anything other than fight…。」
\N<Adventurer>「If you were to take on requests other than combat,
What kind of requests would you take？」
\N<Adventurer>「Could you tell me, just for reference？」

Requests that make use of my charm…… perhaps.
\N<冒険者>「Charm？ What kind of requests are those？」
\N<\n[1]>「Like being a shop assistant？ Or maybe a clothing model would be nice！」
\N<Adventurer>"I don’t think there are such requests…？」
\N<Adventurer>"Because this is an adventurer’s guild, right？ If there were requests, they’d come from the merchant guild, wouldn’t they？」
\N<\n[1]>「But with my charm, it wouldn’t be strange if I got an offer, right？」
\N<冒険者>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
